profile:
Welcome to Triple R Construction Inc! Since arriving in Victoria in 2005, we have become experts in the residential renovation field. We have built a strong network of sub-trades and suppliers, as well as providing opportunities such as the Red Seal apprenticeship program for students which encourages longevity in the company.

Triple R Construction Inc. is focused on 100% customer satisfaction. From the initial meeting through completion of each job, constant communication and feedback are encouraged between the company and our clients in order to help us meet and exceed our clientsâ€™ needs.
 
Call us today for a free quote at 250-634-1989!
 
 
Check out our Facebook page! https://www.facebook.com/TripleRConstructionInc/
